meaningMnemonic: You  <radical>say</radical> things around a  <radical>fire</radical>. In fact there are two  <radical>fire</radical>s, and you're <kanji>talk</kanji>ing with a group of people, all sitting around two nice campfires.
readingMnemonic: You <kanji>talk</kanji> in this intense, fiery way all the way until <reading>dawn</reading> (だん), but no longer! Once dawn comes the discussion needs to be concluded.
